text: Michael Anthony Charles Slemen (11 May 1951 â€“ 20 July 2020)Mike Slemen Profile on scrum.com was an English international rugby union player. He toured South Africa in 1980 with the British and Irish Lions and at the time played club rugby for Liverpool. His career lasted from 1976 to 1980. He died on 21 July 2020, aged 69.England Grand Slam winner Mike Slemen has passed away aged 69 ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Liverpool
title: Mike Slemen
